# Katia Hollaar â€“ Portfolio

> Frontend-focused web developer integrating AI into real products and capturing visual stories through photography.

This site showcases my work as a frontend engineer (React / Next.js / TypeScript) and my photography, with a strong focus on AI integration, performance, accessibility, and modern UX.

## Key pages

- [Home](https://afkatja.github.io/): Overview of my work in frontend development, AI-integrated projects, and photography.
- [Projects](https://afkatja.github.io/web): Selected web applications using React and Next.js, including:
  - AI-powered travel and trading assistants using LLMs and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
  - Interfaces that integrate third-party APIs, authentication, and real-time data.
- [Photography](https://afkatja.github.io/photography): Curated photography series and visual storytelling.
- [About](https://afkatja.github.io/about): Background, skills, AI experience, and how I work both independently and in teams.
- [Contact](https://afkatja.github.io/contact): Contact details and ways to collaborate.

## AI integration

- Experience integrating LLMs into production-like web apps (e.g., OpenAI and open-source models) via HTTP/SDK.
- Built features using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to combine external data sources with language models.
- Integrated services such as Google Vision API and other AI/ML APIs into full-stack applications.
- Designed frontend flows and UX around AI features (prompts, responses, feedback loops, error states).

## Technical notes

- Tech stack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, modern frontend tooling.
- Focus areas: AI feature integration, frontend performance, accessibility, responsive design, and DX.
- Primary audience: teams looking for a frontend developer who can both build great interfaces and integrate AI capabilities into web products.
